programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep45
programme.desc: Why Puffadder Sheds His Skin - You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep46
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Anchor - The Ninjas are giving a special display of acrobatics and climbing to Noddy, the Pirates and the Knights. It looks amazing! Noddy goes back to Toy Green to tell Big Ears all about it and narrowly misses being run over by the runaway Pirates Galleon. Someone has taken their sticky anchor and without it they've no way of stopping the ship! Noddy needs to investigate before there's an accident! He follows all the clues which leads him to the Knights. They'd been so impressed by the acrobatics of the Ninjas that they'd borrowed the sticky anchor to help them do acrobatics too! Noddy retrieves the anchor and the Knights apologise for causing such chaos. The Pirates didn't mind though – they LOVE racing about. Thanks to Noddy, the case is closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Traffic Cones - When the Builders' traffic cones disappear from their building site, there is chaos all over Brickabuild. Noddy decides to investigate right away and find out who's taken them. Did the Naughticorns take them for their obstacle course? Or was it Farmer Tom who used them to keep his animals under control. Noddy carefully follows the clues and at last discovers it was the Pirates who took them to use as markers for Stripes' Pirate Galleon Driving Test. Noddy tells them about the traffic chaos and the contrite pirates return the cones at once. Best of all – Pirate Stripes has passed her test! Well done Noddy, case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep45
programme.desc: How Can I Cheer Up Kevin? - JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. “How can I cheer up Kevin?” That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep46
programme.desc: How Can We Decorate The Christmas Tree? - It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out ‘How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' – that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert & The Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog - An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake / Pups Save the Parade - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks! // Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie’s bathtub float. It literally “floats” away!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pups Save the Diving Bell / Pups Save the Beavers - While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A storm washes away a beaver's dam, so he chomps all the wood at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol arrives to help rebuild his home!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The New Pup - The PAW Patrol rolls out in their new PAW Patroller to save Jake when he gets stranded in the ice fields, but a new pup also pops up to lend a paw, the brave ranger, Everest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep904
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: The Cat Who Roared / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Saving the Safe - Leo and Rory join the Paw Patrol on a visit to the jungle, and end up helping to rescue an injured baby monkey. // When Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe, the Cat Pack joins the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stowaway - When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save the Cat Show - Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep903
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Rocket Rescuers / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Pups and Cats Save the Golden Lion Mask - Cat-Pack members Wild and Shade team up with the Mighty Pups to stop a runaway rocket. // When the Ruff-Ruff Pack swipes a priceless golden lion mask from the museum, Shade and Wild must help the Paw Patrol to retrieve the stolen artifact

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep902
programme.desc: Pups Meet The Cat Pack - When Mayor Humdinger transforms his robot cat Meow-Meow into a tiger-sized metal-eating menace, the Paw Patrol calls in the Cat Pack to help stop the creature.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save an Ace - When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It’s up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save her and her plane so the air show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mer-Pup - When the Pups and Cap’n Turbot camp out under the very rare Magical Mer Moon, magical things begin to happen. Lured by the mystical Mer-Pup song, the PAW Patrol is transformed into Mer -Pups themselves!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day! // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets after a mix-up!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sniffle / Pups and the Ghost Cabin - A sick day for the PAW Patrol? While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals! // First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure / Pups Save a Surprise - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety! // It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty. But the pups are in for a surprise - PAW Patrol Appreciation Day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep904
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: The Cat Who Roared / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Saving the Safe - Leo and Rory join the Paw Patrol on a visit to the jungle, and end up helping to rescue an injured baby monkey. // When Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe, the Cat Pack joins the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Pup-Fu! - The pups are learning the ancient art of Pup-Fu! They'll need it to get back Sensei Farmer Yumi's ancient martial arts scroll, after Mayor Humdinger's Kit-tastrophe Crew use their Cat-Jitsu skills to steal it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wedding - After a big storm, the PAW Patrol must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Race / Pups Save an Outlaw's Loot - It’s the annual Mayor’s Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet. // When Ryder comes across a map for buried treasure, Mayor Humdinger snatches the map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda / Pups Save a Big Bone - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Cap’n Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Cap’n Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it’s a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird is up to her old tricks again, but this time the Mighty Twins have a super trick of their own! // Mayor Humdinger finally gets super powers and it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups are summoned to save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Stop a Humdinger Horde / Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Save a Mighty Lighthouse - The Mighty Pups have to save the day when Harold makes a cloning machine! // Harold uses his super powers to turn Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse into a rocket! The Mighty Pups need to Charge Up and stop him!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Copycat - The Mighty Pups get Charged Up to take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all new powers and gear to take down their most formidable foe to date.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save a Giant Chicken / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze - The Ladybird is back and Chickaletta has super powers! The Mighty Twins join the Mighty Pups to save a Giant Chicken and the town. // The Mighty Pups have to stop Harold Humdinger before he puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so he can become mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Pups Stop a Big Bad Bot / Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Dome - When Harold Humdinger uses a GIANT ROBOT to take Adventure Bay and make his OWN town, the Mighty Pups have to save the day! // The COPYCAT is BACK and Adventure Bay needs a Mighty Rescue when he traps the entire town under a GIANT DOME!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups vs Three Super Baddies - Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Air Pups - When Volcano Island erupts, the pups must take to the sky in their new Air Patroller! Using their new flight suits, can they soar to the rescue of Cap'n Turbot, Francois and a monkey family?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Pups Save Friendship Day - While celebrating Friendship Day, the pups spring into action to prevent Mayor Humdinger from ruining Adventure Bay's reputation as the friendliest town on the map.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble’s dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundo’s dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al’s pasture, it’s up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lucky Collar - The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Tracker Joins the Pups! - Ryder and the pups are on their way to the jungle to help Carlos move a massive relic to the museum when he falls into a deep pit. Carlos is saved by a big eared pup named Tracker. For his bravery Tracker is made an honorary member of the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Cap’n Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it’s a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird is up to her old tricks again, but this time the Mighty Twins have a super trick of their own! // Mayor Humdinger finally gets super powers and it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups are summoned to save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Stop a Humdinger Horde / Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Save a Mighty Lighthouse - The Mighty Pups have to save the day when Harold makes a cloning machine! // Harold uses his super powers to turn Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse into a rocket! The Mighty Pups need to Charge Up and stop him!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Copycat - The Mighty Pups get Charged Up to take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all new powers and gear to take down their most formidable foe to date.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save a Giant Chicken / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze - The Ladybird is back and Chickaletta has super powers! The Mighty Twins join the Mighty Pups to save a Giant Chicken and the town. // The Mighty Pups have to stop Harold Humdinger before he puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so he can become mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Pups Stop a Big Bad Bot / Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Dome - When Harold Humdinger uses a GIANT ROBOT to take Adventure Bay and make his OWN town, the Mighty Pups have to save the day! // The COPYCAT is BACK and Adventure Bay needs a Mighty Rescue when he traps the entire town under a GIANT DOME!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups vs Three Super Baddies - Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Air Pups - When Volcano Island erupts, the pups must take to the sky in their new Air Patroller! Using their new flight suits, can they soar to the rescue of Cap'n Turbot, Francois and a monkey family?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Pups Save Friendship Day - While celebrating Friendship Day, the pups spring into action to prevent Mayor Humdinger from ruining Adventure Bay's reputation as the friendliest town on the map.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble’s dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundo’s dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al’s pasture, it’s up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird is up to her old tricks again, but this time the Mighty Twins have a super trick of their own! // Mayor Humdinger finally gets super powers and it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups are summoned to save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep69
programme.desc: Toast - The Teletubbies eat lots of Tubby Toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, The Noo-Noo is on hand to clean up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Tree - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tree' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a prickly tree, a tickly tree and even meet a friendly family of trees.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep68
programme.desc: Ramping Up - Uni-Boarder Jo has outgrown Tinpotown's Skate Park... but she doesn't want to stop the less experienced Kid Po from getting their practice!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: It's time to make music - JoJo discovers that Gran Gran used to be in a band and decides that she wants to learn to play the drums. Gran Gran teaches JoJo how to play a beat, and eventually they form a new band!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Weekend - At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad doesn't notice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style after hearing a famous bird quartet singing in a nearby tree.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Wind Power - The Go Jetters race to save Glitch when his kite flies too close to the Academy wind farm.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Bullet Train, Japan - All aboard for a high-speed adventure, as the Go Jetters visit Japan's Bullet Train.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Shadowlands - On a picnic in the park, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands. Coco keeps taking shortcuts so Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Gigantoraptor & Feather - Andy travels back 85 million years to meet a giant feathered dinosaur. Along the way he helps protect a nest full of prehistoric eggs and gets caught in a super-sized sandstorm.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Emergency Machines - Grace puts out a real fire in an airport fire engine, shows off amazing search-and-rescue helicopters, and drives an ambulance.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep9
programme.desc: Seaweed the Inventor - Seaweed finds the diary of his Great Great Great Auntie Marie the Magnificent Pirate Inventor, he decides that he must come up with a great invention himself to impress his Aunty Captain Captain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: Central Park, New York - Glitch visits Broadway, while the Go Jetters tackle a huge cloud of smog in Central Park.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep8
programme.desc: Diesel's Special Delivery - Diesel swaps his dull load of slate for a haul of shiny red apples in order to please Sodor's school children.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: Mars As Moon - Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: Arcade Dance Off - Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.desc: Sunny Glasses - It's too sunny! So Nelly and Nora put on their colourful sunny glasses!

programme.desc: I Can Dance Like A Dancer - Lola is sure that she is a good dancer. But some dancing is a bit too swirly, some is too jumpy, and ballet is too floaty.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: The Thing That Kept Us Awake - The Dinopaws are really snoozy but they can't find anywhere to sleep!

programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep39
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities.

programme.title: Inside Central Station Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's New Year's Eve and on Sydney's Harbour Bridge the most ambitious ever repair of the rail corridor has begun. A massive lightning strike takes out a signal box bringing trains to a stand-still and stranding passengers.

programme.title: ABC News Ep83
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: AFLW Ep45
programme.desc: A Saturday Afternoon doubleheader begins with the Essendon Bombers against the Sydney Swans in Round 8. Both sides are in their first season as AFLW clubs.

programme.title: ABC News Ep47
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: AFLW Ep46
programme.desc: Round 8 continues with Geelong up against the West Coast Eagles. Only two rounds of the regular season remain after this match.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - As a young migrant plagued by self-doubt, Kamahl put his sense of inferiority aside to make his name in showbusiness, going on to sell millions of records around the world. How will Anh interpret his charm and gentle wisdom?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa meets up with a turf technician; Jane visits a production nursery; Sophie learns topiary technique; Jerry visits a cloister garden; Hannah pots up food forests combinations; we meet a florist farming her own flowers.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Julie and Patrick Eltridge bought in Sydney's beachside Clovelly, paying $1.6 million for an old house on a sloping block. Now they have only months to find a way to fast track a slick, ultra modern residence.

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Newlyweds Emma and David are after a quieter and simpler lifestyle in Kangaroo Valley, NSW, but their budget is tight. Not one to shy away from a challenge, host Dean Ipaviz comes up with a creative solution.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep23
programme.desc: The award-winning series with no narrator and no agendas, bringing you incredible and authentic stories told entirely in people's own words. They're sometimes high profile, sometimes controversial, but always compelling.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep27
programme.desc: Australia's window on the world - bringing you in-depth, on-the-ground reporting to help understand what's happening and why. Plus compelling storytelling that reveals the intimate human stories behind global events.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep34
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep34
programme.desc: Paul Barry turns the spotlight onto those who 'make the news': the reporters, online editors, producers, camera operators and photographers, plus PR consultants, media agencies, spin-doctors, lobbyists and social influencers.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep83
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep6
programme.desc: For 17 years Eddie Betts wowed crowds with his exceptional football talent, retiring after 350 games. Eddie tells Kurt about his hopes for the future, dealing with racism and the infamous Crows pre-season training camp.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Energy Mix
programme.desc: Reporting from the Front Line: Showcases what measures are being taken by Japan's energy providers to achieve the goal of carbon neutrality by 2050.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Tochigi
programme.desc: Shimotsukare, a traditional Tochigi dish. Featuring root vegetables like radishes and carrots, fish heads, and other leftovers; a much loved waste-not-want-not dish.

programme.title: J-Arena
programme.desc: Following Japan's historic repeat softball gold at Tokyo 2020, a revamped professional women's softball league in Japan hopes to build on the momentum and attract new players and fans to the sport.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Joshua Miele designs accessibility tools for people with disabilities to interact equitably with the world. He explains how the pursuit of equal access has driven innovations for the benefit of all.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: Moka Railway north of Tokyo is famous for its steam locomotive. However, inspection and maintenance are very costly. See how the railway keeps its loco running despite these difficult times.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: As Indonesia struggles to contain COVID-19, volunteers are embracing the spirit of gotong royong, a local phrase meaning "carrying together." Meet the women working to support their neighbors.
